message.markCasesAsRejected: Rejected designs cannot be downloaded. Any credits held for this design will be refunded.
message.quitUploadWarning: Designs for the selected cases will not be processed.
message.rejectedReason: Let us know why you have rejected this design:
message.unsupportedFileStructureHelp:
Only STL or PLY files that include the following terms in their file name or parent folder are accepted:
  • 'Upper' or 'Mandibular'
  • 'Lower' or 'Maxillary'
Try renaming the file(s) or folder(s).

all.paragraph:
Design cases will appear here when scans have been uploaded
To get started, select the Create button

designed.paragraph:
Design cases will appear here when scans have been uploaded
To get started, select the Create button

downloaded.paragraph: Designs that have been downloaded will appear here

issues.paragraph: Any designs that have issues will appear here

processing.paragraph: Designs that are processed will appear here

rejected.paragraph: Designs that have been rejected will appear here

text.permanentlyRemoveCase_one: This case will be permanently removed from the system.
